pkgmetadata.longdescription: Class of GARCH-Ito Models // Provides functions to estimate model parameters and forecast future volatilities using the Unified GARCH-Ito [Kim and Wang (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2016.05.003] and Realized GARCH-Ito [Song et. al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.07.007] models. Optimization is done using augmented Lagrange multiplier method.
